net.datacrow.core.clients

Interface ISynchronizerClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IClient, IFileImportClient

    public interface ISynchronizerClient
extends IFileImportClient
    A client for item synchronizer processes. The processes will notify this client on events, such as errors and warnings, as well as ask the client for additional information to complete or start the process successfully.
    Author:
    Robert Jan van der Waals
    See Also:
    Synchronizer

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface net.datacrow.core.clients.IClient

        _ERROR, _INFO, _WARNING

    • Method Detail

      • isReparseFiles

        boolean isReparseFiles()
        Indicates whether existing files should be reparsed to extract new information.
        Returns:
        reparse y/n

      • getItemPickMode

        int getItemPickMode()
        Returns the item pick mode. This indicates which items should be synchronized.
        Returns:
        the item pick mode; Synchronizer._ALL or Synchronizer._SELECTED
        See Also:
        Synchronizer

      • getItemKeys

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getItemKeys()
        Returns the item keys to be processed by the Synchronizer.
        Returns:
        item key list

      • notifyProcessed

        void notifyProcessed(DcObject dco)
        The client is notified that an item has been processed. Used for progress tracking and performing GUI updates.
        Parameters:
        dco - the processed (synchronized) item
